name: Giving & Receiving: The Superb Adventures of Salmon Boy
name_original: Giving & Receiving: The Superb Adventures of Salmon Boy
description:
The Controls:

ButtonActionLeft Button / A
Move left & scale wall
Right Button / D
Move right & scale wall
Space
Jump & climb ladder
Move Mouse
Aim Weapon
Left Mouse Click
Attack

The Premise:

Play as the superb  Salmon 'Delvery Man' Bridges; a literal fish out of water, as you attempt to deliver miscalanious items across the plains of Blackpool, while the infamous Lewis Brindley Bristol Pusher has travelled north with his minions in an attempt to moderately inconvinience you.

The Hints:
- Don't forget to pick up some items from the depot when you start

-Struggling to find your destination? keep going right!

-Don't step in the fire

The Thanks:

Syhthwave E - TeknoAxe
Mine Tileset - Grande Pixel in Game Maker Studio
Pixel Platformer Art Pack - Pixel Programmer in Game Maker Studio
Chrismtas Winter Fir Trees - Gerd Altmann on Pixabay
